title: Healthcare Onboarding eLearning Module
description: Interactive AODA-compliant onboarding course for healthcare workers at Oak Valley Health, featuring scenario-based learning and gamification elements.
overview: Developed a comprehensive onboarding program for new healthcare staff at Markham Stouffville Hospital and Uxbridge Hospital. The course incorporates interactive scenarios, knowledge checks, and gamified elements to engage learners while ensuring compliance with accessibility standards.
keyTasks: Conducted needs assessment with hospital stakeholders and SMEs
Designed interactive learning modules using adult learning principles
Developed scenario-based assessments for critical healthcare procedures
Ensured AODA compliance throughout all course materials
Implemented gamification mechanics to increase engagement

title: Workplace Safety Training with Animation
description: Animated workplace safety training module for long-term care facilities, making complex safety procedures engaging and memorable.
overview: Created an engaging safety training course for Extendicare long-term care facilities. Used character animation and interactive scenarios to teach critical safety protocols in an accessible and memorable way.
keyTasks: Scripted and storyboarded animated safety scenarios
Created custom characters and animations using Vyond
Developed branching scenarios for decision-making practice
Integrated audio narration and closed captions
Built interactive knowledge checks and assessments

title: Faculty Development: Inclusive Teaching Practices
description: Self-paced professional development course for Durham College faculty on inclusive and accessible teaching methodologies.
overview: Designed and developed a comprehensive professional development course for college instructors focusing on inclusive teaching practices, universal design for learning (UDL), and accessibility in higher education.
keyTasks: Consulted with faculty and accessibility services team
Designed modular, self-paced learning pathway
Created video demonstrations of inclusive teaching strategies
Developed practical implementation guides and templates
Built reflection activities and peer collaboration forums
outcomes: Trained 200+ faculty members in first semester
Increased adoption of UDL principles by 65%

title: Modern Construction Company Website
description: Headless CMS website for a construction contractor with project portfolio showcase, client testimonials, and contact forms.
overview: Built a modern, fully responsive website for a commercial construction company. Integrated Sanity CMS to allow the client to easily update projects, testimonials, and service offerings without developer intervention.
keyTasks: Designed custom UI with Tailwind CSS
Integrated Sanity CMS for content management
Created dynamic project portfolio with filtering
Implemented contact forms with email notifications
Optimized for performance and SEO
Deployed to Vercel with automatic deployments
outcomes: Client able to manage all content independently

title: Church Community Website with Event Management
description: Interactive community website with event calendar, sermon archive, online giving integration, and member portal.
overview: Developed a comprehensive website for a local church community featuring event registration, sermon streaming, online giving, and a members-only resource portal.
keyTasks: Built event calendar with registration and RSVP functionality
Integrated Stripe for online donations
Created sermon archive with audio/video playback
Developed member authentication and resource portal
Implemented mobile-first responsive design
Set up analytics and engagement tracking

title: Custom E-commerce Storefront
description: Shopify-integrated e-commerce website with custom product filters, wishlist functionality, and smooth animations.
overview: Created a high-performance e-commerce storefront with Shopify backend integration, featuring advanced product filtering, smooth scroll animations, and an intuitive shopping experience.
keyTasks: Integrated Shopify Storefront API
Built custom product filtering and search
Implemented cart and checkout flow
Added GSAP animations for enhanced UX
Optimized images and lazy loading
Implemented wishlist and product comparison features
outcomes: Average page load time under 1.5 seconds

title: Interactive 3D Portfolio Website
description: Immersive portfolio website featuring Three.js 3D elements, particle effects, and smooth scroll animations.
overview: Designed and developed an interactive portfolio website showcasing web development and 3D design skills through immersive Three.js experiences and smooth GSAP animations.
keyTasks: Created 3D models and scenes using Three.js
Implemented scroll-based animation sequences with GSAP
Built particle systems and shader effects
Optimized 3D performance for mobile devices
Designed responsive UI that adapts to 3D content
